About

Trusted engineering partner in Hosur

HOSUR INFRATECH brings together experience in HVAC, lab infrastructure, and interiors to deliver reliable, compliant, and future-ready facilities for clients across manufacturing, education, and research.

Our teams work closely with consultants, architects, and facility owners from design to handover, ensuring every system is coordinated, documented, and maintainable.
